html:
362 U.S. 609

80 S.Ct. 960

4 L.Ed.2d 1009

HELM et al.
v.
ARIZONA.

No. 768.

Supreme Court of the United States

May 16, 1960

Mr. Irving A. Jennings, for appellants.

Messrs. Wade Church, Atty. Gen. of Arizona, Leslie C. Hardy, Chief Asst. Atty. Gen., and Jay Dushoff, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.

PER CURIAM.

1

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
